title: Error while installing league? :s

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
Trying to install league and this error pops up, can anyone help me please? 
I recently bought a new labtop today and its clean.

replies.body: When I've seen cases like this, it's usually on a new computer that needs to get Windows updated.  Doing that should help, but you can manually download [Visual C+++](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=3387).  That should get you going with the installation!
